domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

text: I’m not here to say that #Covid19 isn’t dangerous, but how many members of Congress or the Trump administration have died from the virus?  Any A-list celebrities die yet?   If it were deadly, wouldn’t at least one of them have died? They shake a lot of hands. Are we overreacting?
